title: New fitness center, Professional on-site management team
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

description:
***Photos are of a similar unit, every unit is unique.*** Welcome to 1217 Spring Garden! This five-story building, the first reinforced concrete structure in the city, began life towards the end of the 19th century as the home of the Bilgram Machine Works and was later converted into this uniquely designed loft-style building featuring 40 units in its entirety. Each unit with its own DNA and original structure! As you enter the building using it’s smart building access controls, you’ll find a lobby designed to both pay homage to the building’s 19th-century industrial past and add some 21st-century gloss. You’ll also take notice of its wheel chair accessibility and new elevator in the former freight elevator shaft. Mail room is also located in the main lobby for convenience. Take a ride up to the 3rd floor where you’ll find unit 304. Walk right into the original industrial DNA design including its original hard wood flooring, loft, and brick exposed walls. You’ll surely take notice of it’s high ceiling and solid structure! As you move along you’ll find a large kitchen with plenty of cabinet storage and all of your essential appliances and your two nicely sized bedrooms. Your master bedroom includes a large closet and master bath! Make sure you stop by the fitness center and bicycle + skateboard storage room located on level B. Enjoy the tour!
1217-35 Spring Garden St #304

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home with Wood Floors on Rittenhouse Square
description:
This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home at 712 on the 7th floor features large windows that face south and have a Chancellor Street view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home features wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as April 28, 2023!
Apartment Home Features:
* Renovated kitchen and bathroom
* Wood floors
* Unfurnished studio apartment home on 7th floor
* Large south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Granite kitchen counters
* White kitchen cabinets
* All utilities, except cable and internet, are included
Community Amenities:
* Historic high-rise building on the lovely Rittenhouse Square
* 8,000-square-foot lounge with seating areas, pool table, conference room, and kitchen
* Fitness center
* Yoga studio
* Sauna
* Dog spa
* Package room
* Guest suites for the friends and family of current residents
* Laundry room on every floor and third floor laundry facility. No quarters! Use a laundry card.
* Elevator building with front door attendant and front desk concierge
* Online resident portal RentCafe for maintenance requests, rent payments, lease renewals, and more
* On-site maintenance
* Attached valet parking garage! Parking spaces not managed by community, so the cost is separate.
* Bicycle storage in the attached parking garage
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to retail stores, grocery stores, restaurants, and more! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Vans, J.Crew, Tiffany & Co., Philadelphia Runner, allbirds, Vince, New Balance, and Pandora. Go grocery shopping at Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, and Giant. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Via Locusta, Schlesinger's, Monk's Cafe, Spice Finch, Zama, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pietro's, a.kitchen, and The Love. Pick up "The Rittenhouse Square" bar at The Bakeshop on 20th. Relax with a manicure at Coco Blue Spruce. View the collection at The Mütter Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday year-round. There is so much to do in this area!
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 712 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Schedule an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate at rittenhouseclaridge.com.
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street

title: This 2-bedroom New York-style loft condo is a real stunner!!!
description:
** 2 Car PARKING ** This 2-bedroom New York-style loft condo is a real stunner!!! It is the premier unit in the Candy Factory Lofts. Light floods in the large and many windows at every time of day. The kitchen, dining area, and living room comprise the very large open floor plan with 14 ft. ceilings. The designer kitchen has stainless cabinets, granite countertops, and maple floors running throughout. The very large master bedroom has a walk-in closet. The second bedroom is also plenty of roomy. The bathroom is smartly designed to function as a full bathroom but can be sectioned off by a sliding door to make it a powder room, a great feature for entertaining. This is only one of 2 units in the building that has its own private deck. It is accessed by a spiral stair in the living room area. The unobstructed deck views go for miles in every direction. There is a large coat closet/storage closet that also houses the laundry room just off the front hallway. The 2 Car PARKING is covered and gated!!! Common bike storage on the first floor. A short walk/ride takes you to all of Fishtown's new restaurants and shops. Easy walk to the Market-Frankford El and the trolley.

title: Brand-new two-bedroom loft in the Spring Arts section of Philadelphia!
description:
Be the first to live in this brand-new two-bedroom loft in the Spring Arts section of Philadelphia! This unit sits on the top floor of a beautifully restored carriage house. It is a stunning blend of industrial charm and modern sophistication. The spacious open-concept living space boasts vaulted exposed timber ceilings, large windows custom Anderson windows, and beautifully exposed brick walls that add character and warmth. The designer kitchen includes matte black cabinetry, a Samsung appliance package, and an oversized island with natural stone counters and backsplash! Perfect for entertaining guests or simply enjoying a meal at home. The living room is spacious, with plenty of natural light streaming in through the large windows, creating a bright and airy environment, coupled with exposed duct work running the length of the unit. Access control is through a Latch system, with full and total control via your mobile phone. Located in the vibrant neighborhood of Spring Arts, the property is located within walking distance to a brand new full-sized Giant grocer, gyms, cafes, hot new restaurants/bars, and concert venues! title: Everything you need right in the heart of Center City, just steps from
description: Everything you need right in the heart of Center City, just steps from Rittenhouse Square. This 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom penthouse condo in an elevator building may be 503 square feet, but it packs a punch! Enter into the spacious living room and immediately you are welcomed by bright, natural light with city views from the two large windows. This corner, top floor unit receives some of the best light in the building! The kitchen which features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and plenty of counter space for the at-home chef, is perfectly tucked away in the corner, but you can still easily chat with guests over the breakfast bar. If cooking isn't your thing, you're just steps from all of the amazing restaurants that Center City has to offer. Down the hallway, the bedroom easily accommodates a queen sized bed plus any additional furniture you may have. Beautiful hardwood floors throughout complement the unit. Two large closets, one in the bedroom and one in the hallway, alleviate any storage concerns. Brand new HVAC was installed in 2019 and laundry is available in the building. Chestnutview Condominium, a pet-friendly building, features one of the lowest monthly condo fees in the area and includes building maintenance and insurance, water/sewer, hot water, snow removal, trash removal and the management fee. The ideal location is a stone's throw away from Center City's best restaurants, shops and more plus it's within close proximity to UPenn, Drexel, University of the Sciences, and University of The Arts.

title: Welcome to Shackamaxon Court, a gated courtyard community of 18 boutiq
description: Welcome to Shackamaxon Court, a gated courtyard community of 18 boutique condos in a quaint and tranquil enclave in the heart of vibrant and bustling Fishtown. Situated just steps from some of the city's best restaurants, cafes, galleries and boutique shopping but tucked away just off the beaten path, this unit has all the elements to live simply and beautifully without compromising location. In keeping with the aesthetic of the neighborhood, this development is an adaptive reuse of an historic building with every detail considered to retain its integrity. Renowned Fishtown artist Robert Phillips' custom hand-crafted iron gates greet you as you enter the garden courtyard. Unit #9 boasts a well-designed floor plan with bright, airy rooms and tons of natural light in this one bedroom, one bath corner unit. Find find gleaming hardwood floors, recessed lighting and tasteful finishes. The kitchen is open to the living room for easy entertaining and features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and walnut cabinets. A lovely bedroom offers a vaulted ceiling and skylight and plenty of closet space. The bathroom is outfitted with custom glass and ceramic tile, a bowl sink and Moen fixtures. Other features include a high efficiency Sanyo heat pump, in-unit laundry and additional secure storage in the basement. A delightful sanctuary, the common courtyard is the perfect place for a cup of coffee on a cool autumn morning. You'll love being a part of Fishtown's renaissance. Fishtown Tavern, just a block away will be your favorite watering hole and you'll love shopping at Riverwards Produce.

title: Everything you need right in the heart of Center City, just steps from
description: Everything you need right in the heart of Center City, just steps from Rittenhouse Square. This 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom penthouse condo in an elevator building may be 503 square feet, but it packs a punch! Enter into the spacious living room and immediately you are welcomed by bright, natural light with city views from the two large windows. This corner, top floor unit receives some of the best light in the building! The kitchen which features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and plenty of counter space for the at-home chef, is perfectly tucked away in the corner, but you can still easily chat with guests over the breakfast bar. If cooking isn't your thing, you're just steps from all of the amazing restaurants that Center City has to offer. Down the hallway, the bedroom easily accommodates a queen sized bed plus any additional furniture you may have. Beautiful hardwood floors throughout complement the unit. Two large closets, one in the bedroom and one in the hallway, alleviate any storage concerns. Brand new HVAC was installed in 2019 and laundry is available in the building. Chestnutview Condominium, a pet-friendly building, features one of the lowest monthly condo fees in the area and includes building maintenance and insurance, water/sewer, hot water, snow removal, trash removal and the management fee. The ideal location is a stone's throw away from Center City's best restaurants, shops and more plus it's within close proximity to UPenn, Drexel, University of the Sciences, and University of The Arts.

title: One Bedroom Apartment Home with Wood Floors
description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home at 1502 on the 15th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The large windows face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with city skyline to the left. The renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters! This kitchen is also fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. title: Lovely one bedroom unit in sought after Queen Village
description:
Lovely one bedroom unit in sought after Queen Village. This quaint, self managed and well maintained unit and building has a spacious, shared, gated courtyard space. This unit offers a nice sized living area with hardwood floors, exposed brick, recessed lighting and a ceiling fan, a fully-equipped updated kitchen with tile backsplash, granite countertops, and breakfast bar, a full updated bath with built-in shelving a shower/tub combination, and a sizeable bedroom in the rear. There is central air, good closet space, an in-unit washer/dryer, newer HVAC system and trash and snow removal services. The location is awesome, close to popular Philadelphia Java Company, For Pete’s Sake Pub, Lucky’s Last Chance, Headhouse Salon, and green spaces such as Mario Lanza Park, and Shot Tower Recreation Center. Center City and 95 are both extremely accessible to this area. Don’t miss out on this opportunity!
213 Christian St #3
